730059E6.Line1.BAE4.Bar: Blood from the sky...a foul omen if ever there was one.

7300649C.Line1.BAE4.Dru: The sky is rent open, bleeding...Sanctuary is torn asunder.

73008D67.Line1.BAE4.Nec: A rain of blood...intriguing. Another piece of the prophecy?

73009FB9.Line1.BAE4.Rog: Blood rain...not good. Timeâ€™s running out on this job.

7300A405.Line1.BAE4.Sor: Blood from the sky...no mortal magic holds this power.
